title: Challenges
body:
Id like to have challenges for each champion. And if you made some of them you should get a reward (summ icon, ip ,profile background...)
The challenges should be for example "Hit x {{champion:32}}  Q's" or "Get a tripple kill with {{champion:202}}'s Ult)

The challenges should be hard but possible.


-BlaZze

replies.body: I played a few challenges a few days ago to i can tell you them
